During the first year of my animation course, the lecturer wanted us to do a simple whiteboard animation like this where you can see an image slowly appear and tell a story.

But for some reason we got super competitive and we ended up drawing full frame by frame animations on whiteboard, where instead of taking a picture every few strokes per second, we drew entire frames and took a single picture, erased the entire frame and drew another frame.

A one or two day project became a whole week of not going home.
